Copycat In-N-Out Special Sauce


Ingredients
2/3 cup mayonnaise
3 tablespoons ketchup
2 tablespoons pickle relish
1 1/2 teaspoons vinegar
1/2 teaspoon sugar
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon pepper (optional)

Cooking Instructions

Stir mayonnaise, ketchup, pickle relish, vinegar, sugar,
salt, and pepper together in a small bowl and until well
combined. Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 2
weeks.
